column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Everytime I visit Houston
column2: I must stop by The Common Bond! Their pastries are delicious and neatly done. Their food is never a disappointment
column3: and never forget to get the latte! Beware of arriving on Sunday brunch! There is usually a long line
column4: but it moves quickly. I recommend this place for all travelers. The place is clean and neat
